entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
